channel.title: LahainGeneration 317 (In Development)
channel.description:
This is my server I'm developing ATM.... I used a Blank source and client to make this so I started from scratch which was a good idea so I can get used to the making of a server.
Any ways this is my server. It's just a basic server so far, so there's not that much. I'll be adding some quests to make a story line for this server. I'm not making the quest yet, but I'll make sure to make one as soon as possible.
[u][b]Features[/b][/u] Working Abbysal Whip Working Dragon 2H Working Scimitars Working Drops Working Dragon Dagger Wild 4 Areas (ATM) Falador (Home) Varrock Knights Arena (In Duel Arena, Full of NPC's to train on) Ofa (Working on ATM) [u][b]Commands[/b][/u] ::Home ::Varrock ::Knights (To Knights Arena) ::Bank (Opens Bank "MIGHT REMOVE") ::empty (Empties Inventory "MIGHT REMOVE") ::Ofa (Goes to Ofa cave boss)
[b][u]Fixing[/u][/b] Taking out Wild in Edgeville Monster Animations
[b][u]Soon to Come[/u][/b] More NPC's More Weapons More Shops More Areas BOSS #2 (Necro)
[b][u]Knights Arena[/u][/b]
[u][b]At Home spawn[/b][/u]
Picture of Ofa coming later... I'm adding pictures later after school tomorrow, I got to go sleep

item.title: LahainGeneration 317 (In Development)
item.dc:creator: @LahainaGeneration LahainaGeneration
item.description:
@LahainaGeneration wrote:

This is my server I’m developing ATM… I used a Blank source and client to make this so I started from scratch which was a good idea so I can get used to the making of a server.

Any ways this is my server. It’s just a basic server so far, so there’s not that much.
I’ll be adding some quests to make a story line for this server. I’m not making the quest yet, but I’ll make sure to make one as soon as possible.

Features
Working Abbysal Whip
Working Dragon 2H
Working Scimitars
Working Drops
Working Dragon Dagger
Wild
4 Areas (ATM)
Falador (Home)
Varrock
Knights Arena (In Duel Arena, Full of NPC’s to train on)
Ofa (Working on ATM)
Commands
::Home
::Varrock
::Knights (To Knights Arena)
::Bank (Opens Bank “MIGHT REMOVE”)
::empty (Empties Inventory “MIGHT REMOVE”)
::Ofa (Goes to Ofa cave boss)

Fixing
Taking out Wild in Edgeville
Monster Animations

Soon to Come
More NPC’s
More Weapons
More Shops
More Areas
BOSS #2 (Necro)

Knights Arena

At Home spawn

Picture of Ofa coming later…
I’m adding pictures later after school tomorrow, I got to go sleep

Read full topic
